Title: Blogging for medical education – A personal view
Abstract: © 2018, Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh. All rights reserved.Medical education has evolved considerably from didactic and lecture-based to self-directed, especially with the rise of online platforms. While large organisations may commission or create entire customised courses for online learning, the individual teacher has a more modest and immediately accessible tool with which to disseminate information to students and other learners: blogging.
